scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn run firebase deploy --only functions -P staging
scripts.deploy:production: yarn run firebase deploy --only functions -P production
scripts.importMailchimp:production: yarn run build && FIREBASE=prod node lib/scripts/importMailchimp.js
scripts.getIapReceipts:production: yarn run build && FIREBASE=prod node lib/scripts/iapUsersSignup.js
scripts.getContent:staging: yarn run build && FIREBASE=dev node lib/scripts/getContent.js
scripts.getContent:production: yarn run build && FIREBASE=prod node lib/scripts/getContent.js
scripts.copyContent:staging: yarn run build && FIREBASE=dev node lib/scripts/copyContent.js
scripts.getTeachers:production: yarn run build && FIREBASE=prod node lib/scripts/getTeachers.js
scripts.copyTeachers:staging: yarn run build && FIREBASE=dev node lib/scripts/copyTeachers.js
